entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 14. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
